name: Lawrence J. FIERST and Betty G. Fierst, his Wife, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH LAND TITLE INSURANCE COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Fierst v. Commonwealth Land Title Insurance
docket_number: Appeal No. 147 Western District Allocatur Docket 1991

parties: Lawrence J. FIERST and Betty G. Fierst, his Wife, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH LAND TITLE INSURANCE COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The Order of Superior Court dated December 7, 1990, at No. 67 Pittsburgh, 1990, 410 Pa.Super. 660, 590 A.2d 380, which reversed the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Westmoreland County, dated December 20, 1989, No. 10349 of 1981, is hereby reversed and remanded to Superior Court to reconsider the issues raised on appeal on their merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
600 A.2d 189
Lawrence J. FIERST and Betty G. Fierst, his Wife, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH LAND TITLE INSURANCE COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 10, 1992.
